name: Beautiful
description:
You want to make something beautiful,
but you're in the wrong game...

and yet you wander through the wasteland,
trying to bring some light to it,
despite the futility of it all.

- - - - - -

+ Created in 7 days for the GAME IDEA Jam +
+ Based a tweet by @pippinbarr +
+ Game design by @erikaverkaaik +
+ With music from Incompetech +

PLAYS BEST WITH GAMEPAD
this was the first game I programmed myself, so unfortunately it feels pretty janky without a gamepad

~ Please enjoy ~

- - - - - -

CHANGELOG:

v1.1 (18.10.16) - Gamepad now works with menu
